physical_appearance: This is a wooden walking stick. It has a brown body with black patterns. The walking stick is topped by a gold knob. The face of the stick is decorated with foliage motifs and crowned with an eight-pointed star.
sgcool_label_text: The body of this wooden walking stick has a brown grain with black patterns. It is topped by a gold knob, its facets decorated with foliate designs and crowned with an eight-pointed star. Walking sticks with a golden attachment were popular in 19th century Europe and often completed a gentlemanâ€™s ensemble. It is part of a donation which contains a mixture of garments worn by Peranakan men and women.
subject_terms_2: Staffs (Sticks, canes, etc.) Motifs Culture diffusion
